channel.title: Quads
channel.description:
Contains Quads - Contains lines
What does this error mean on Datmaker? x.x Sorry, not good with model making atm..

item.title: Quads
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

If your version of metasequoia is taken out of basic mode (file > untick basic mode), then you can select all, then at the top menu, press selected, and “triangulate selected faces”.

If your version of metasequoia is registered, then you can select all, and go to object, and then “Delete lines”.

The contains lines problem does not actually matter, they make no difference whatsoever to the final model in game, but the quads are a problem.

Read full topic
